entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
